DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this project is to examine the effects of mu-opiate antagonism on the rewarding and reinforcing effects of delta-9-tetrahydrocannabinol (THC), the main psychoactive ingredient of cannabis.
DOC.brief_title: The Effects of âˆ†-9-THC and Naloxone in Humans
DOC.criteria: At least one exposure to Cannabis Cannabis Naive
